item.title: Deriving the Black-Scholes Formula
item.description: In this project, we derive the Black-Scholes formula and apply it to real world options. In order to tackle the challenge of anticipating the behavior of the option market, a binomial model is obtained. The aforementioned model is the foundation upon which the Black-Scholes formula for European option pricing is developed. At the end, an analysis on the reliability of Black-Scholes will be implemented using real world data.
